note.p: Land steward and district surveyor. Surveyor, Bromley Highway District, 1863. Resident of Chislehurst, Kent, and later Bromley, Kent.
Bromley Highway Board (London Borough of Bromley Archives 847/HB/B/1)
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/464/5643), 1871 (RG10/873/111/8)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 October 2018)
